WorkItem.Description:
Did a fresh item cache DL and some things jumped out as obviously bad since the last one I had:
- Stormrider's Spaulders [359] [60289] in the default database have 3 green stats.  The mastery on them should be removed.  This moves them from BiS to not :P.
- Poison Protocol Spaulders [359] [59120] have a 10 mastery socket bonus, default cache has none.
- DMC:H is looking like 1 PPM as the correct model but I don't think the jury is in for sure on it yet.

Comments.Message: I'll get those fixed in the next update. DMC:H is still up in the air on what the proc rate is. Some places I see a 1 PPM (ungeared), Full Fury I see 4 PPM. So I'm just not sure right now.
